Title: Requires trucks to utilize commercial GPS
Summary: Requires trucks to utilize commercial GPS designed for use by a commercial vehicle which is able to provide audible and visual warnings when the truck is on a route where the height, weight, width, or length of the truck exceeds the limitations of such route when operating on public highways in the state.
LawCode: Add ยง379, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring trucks to utilize commercial GPS
